0:
--------------------
Text: "(I Can't Make It) Another Day" is a song by American recording artist Michael Jackson featuring Lenny Kravitz, released on the posthumous album "Michael" which has sold 6.5 million globally.
Triplets:<(I Can't Make It) Another Day
1:
--------------------
Text: (I Can't Make It) Another Day:  Initially leaked as a 90-second snippet, it was referred to as "Another Day".
Triplets:<>(I Can't Make It)
2:
Text: (I Can't Make It) Another Day:  Shortly after the leak, singer-songwriter Lenny Kravitz confirmed that he had produced and composed "Another Day"; he stated that although he did not leak the song, he would like to have the full version of the song—in which he also features—officially released.
Triplets:<Lenny Kravitz
